# An overview of the dataset
In this study, a cross-sectional survey is conducted with a sample size of 1182 students of different age groups from different educational institutions in Delhi National Capital Region (NCR).

# A brief plan for the exploratory analysis: What questions can be answered from the dataset?
Analize the impact of Covid 19 and its impact on students from various age range and see how they we effected both mentally and physically.
